entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:04 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
